Text: Hey guys, I'll be uploading the other books in this series asap, but unfortunately I cannot find the 10th book - The Crippled God - on audiobook anywhere, but I believe the ebook is available on here. :) If I do come across the audiobook, I'll upload it.
I'd really love to see you upload these, I can only find the first two and with those it's in horrible quality.
Ventricle, thanks so much for this... been wanting the audiobook forever. Cannot wait for the sequels - Cheers again!!!
BOOKS 2 - 8 ARE NOW UP. Hope they're okay :) Enjoy, guys, and don't forget to seed! Cheers! -Ventricle.
